nodes.bodyText: Is there a reason this method couldn't exist within InstallPluginCommand?

nodes.bodyText: There used to be more code involved here, which is why I split it out, but as you rightly point out it's just short-ish method now. I've folded it back into the installer class.

nodes.bodyText: This comment is out of date?
